heading: HB00123
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE POLYTECHNIC UNIVERSITY OF THE PHILIPPINES-SANTA ROSA BRANCH IN THE CITY OF SANTA ROSA, PROVINCE OF LAGUNA, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREOF AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2020-01-27, transmitted to the Senate on 2020-01-28 and received by the Senate on 2020-01-28 Substituted by HB05738
